text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse We know the Democratic Party has and is the Party of Slaves and are now trying to put them back in chains. The covid19 has given the Democraps a chance that Biden wants to put chains back on the African Americans to keep them bonded to YES Democraps for their votes at ELECTIONS.
